uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs

Class ConstantInput<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.ConstantInput<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - type of value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input<V>, OptionalInput, UnmodifiableInput

    public class ConstantInput<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements UnmodifiableInput, Input<V>, OptionalInput
    a read-only input that cannot be modified. For convenience in update forms it can cache an object value but this should never actually be edited by the input instead the text label should be displayed. This input only validates against optional input
